ProductInfo.Features:
Kit Includes 13 Products -- All Brand New with Manufacturer supplied accessories, and Warranty:
Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital Camera SLR Kit With Canon EF-S 18-55mm IS II and Canon 75-300mm III Zoom Lens + Transcend 64 GB Class 10 SDXC Card
LP-E8 High Capacity Lithium-Ion Battery Pack + 2 Zeikos 58mm UV Filters
SDHC Card Reader + Large Camera Bag + Memory Card Wallet + Digital Camera Cleaning Kit
Screen Protector + 50-Inch Tripod --- Exclusive by TheImagingWorld
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital Camera SLR Kit With Canon EF-S 18-55mm IS II + Canon EF 75-300mm III Autofocus Lens + 64GB Card + Battery + 2 Filters + Tripod + Accessory Kit
